return_policy_content:
ORDERS

Order may be placed on www.zyocollections.com at any time. Upon order completion you will received an email with tracking information. If you do not receive shipping confirmation please contact us at info@zyocollections.com  
 
Orders placed during holiday seasons can take longer due to high volume of orders. If you have a special request regarding availability, sizing and more please don’t hesitate to contact us at info@zyocollections.com   or 00971505040318

RETURNS AND REFUNDS:

At ZYO collections we are dedicated to provide the most positive shopping experience for all of our customers. ZYO collections pieces are eligible for exchange after 7 days of purchase. We can exchange items not less than the amount purchased. we do not accept returns or refunds.

For more information contact us through info@zyocollections.com or009 71505040318

 

RETURNS AND REFUNDS:

At ZYO collections we are dedicated to providing the most positive shopping experience for all of our customers. ZYO collections pieces are eligible for exchange after 7 days of purchase. We can exchange items not less than the amount purchased. we do not accept returns or refunds.

For more information contact us through info@zyocollections.com or 00971505040318

 

REPAIRS:

At ZYO collections each piece of our creations are made to become yours. If you experience the need for repair or resizing on any ZYO  collections pieces please contact info@zyocollections.com  or 00971505040318

Please note that the charge for delivery is 60 AED 
Please provide your name address and order number and repair issue.  
We accept repairs and exchange from items purchased on www.zyocollections.com only.
about_us_content:
ZYO Collections (Zero Year Old) is a Dubai-UAE based fashion and beauty retailer brand that believes that “Fashion has no age”, you wear what you feel like regardless of age.

It is our passion to let you express yourselves, love yourselves through fashion with the very best items, uniqueness and effective costumer service.

Majority of our products are
manufactured in Turkey with high quality yet at reasonable prices. We hope you enjoy our products as much as we enjoy offering them to you.  Please do not hesitate to contact us and share your feedback, suggestions or inquiries to help in the growing ZYO family.
